ud1.10:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud1.10:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bahiyo daruciriyo supparake pativasati samuddatire sakkato garukato manito pujito apacito labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud1.10:1.4: Atha kho bahiyassa daruciriyassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
ud1.10:1.5: “ye kho keci loke arahanto va arahattamaggam va samapanna, aham tesam annataro”ti.
ud1.10:2.1: Atha kho bahiyassa daruciriyassa puranasalohita devata anukampika atthakama bahiyassa daruciriyassa cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya yena bahiyo daruciriyo tenupasankami; upasankamitva bahiyam daruciriyam etadavoca:
ud1.10:2.2: “neva kho tvam, bahiya, araha, napi arahattamaggam va samapanno.
ud1.10:2.3: Sapi te patipada natthi yaya tvam araha va assa arahattamaggam va samapanno”ti.
ud1.10:3.1: “Atha ke carahi sadevake loke arahanto va arahattamaggam va samapanna”ti?
ud1.10:3.2: “Atthi, bahiya, uttaresu janapadesu savatthi nama nagaram.
ud1.10:3.3: Tattha so bhagava etarahi viharati araham sammasambuddho.
ud1.10:3.4: So hi, bahiya, bhagava araha ceva arahattaya ca dhammam deseti”ti.
ud1.10:4.1: Atha kho bahiyo daruciriyo taya devataya samvejito tavadeva supparakamha pakkami.
ud1.10:4.2: Sabbattha ekarattiparivasena yena savatthi jetavanam anathapindikassa aramo tenupasankami.
ud1.10:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula bhikkhu abbhokase cankamanti.
ud1.10:4.4: Atha kho bahiyo daruciriyo yena te bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva te bhikkhu etadavoca:
ud1.10:4.5: “kaham nu kho, bhante, etarahi bhagava viharati araham sammasambuddho?
ud1.10:4.6: Dassanakamamha mayam tam bhagavantam arahantam sammasambuddhan”ti.
ud1.10:5.1: Atha kho bahiyo daruciriyo taramanarupo jetavana nikkhamitva savatthim pavisitva addasa bhagavantam savatthiyam pindaya carantam pasadikam pasadaniyam santindriyam santamanasam uttamadamathasamathamanuppattam dantam guttam yatindriyam nagam.
ud1.10:5.2: Disvana yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavato pade sirasa nipatitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud1.10:5.3: “desetu me, bhante, bhagava dhammam; desetu sugato dhammam,
ud1.10:5.5: Evam vutte, bhagava bahiyam daruciriyam etadavoca:
ud1.10:5.6: “akalo kho tava, bahiya, antaragharam pavitthamha pindaya”ti.
ud1.10:6.1: Dutiyampi kho bahiyo daruciriyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud1.10:6.2: “dujjanam kho panetam, bhante, bhagavato va jivitantarayanam, mayham va jivitantarayanam.
ud1.10:6.4: desetu sugato dhammam, yam mamassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
ud1.10:6.5: Dutiyampi kho bhagava bahiyam daruciriyam etadavoca:
ud1.10:6.6: “akalo kho tava, bahiya, antaragharam pavitthamha pindaya”ti.
ud1.10:7.1: Tatiyampi kho bahiyo daruciriyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud1.10:7.2: “dujjanam kho panetam, bhante, bhagavato va jivitantarayanam, mayham va jivitantarayanam.
ud1.10:7.4: desetu sugato dhammam, yam mamassa digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
ud1.10:8.2: ‘ditthe ditthamattam bhavissati, sute sutamattam bhavissati, mute mutamattam bhavissati, vinnate vinnatamattam bhavissati’ti.
ud1.10:8.4: Yato kho te, bahiya, ditthe ditthamattam bhavissati, sute sutamattam bhavissati, mute mutamattam bhavissati, vinnate vinnatamattam bhavissati,
ud1.10:8.9: tato tvam, bahiya, nevidha na huram na ubhayamantarena.
ud1.10:9.1: Atha kho bahiyassa daruciriyassa bhagavato imaya sankhittaya dhammadesanaya tavadeva anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucci.
ud1.10:10.1: Atha kho bhagava bahiyam daruciriyam imina sankhittena ovadena ovaditva pakkami.
ud1.10:10.2: Atha kho acirapakkantassa bhagavato bahiyam daruciriyam gavi tarunavaccha adhipatitva jivita voropesi.
ud1.10:11.1: Atha kho bhagava savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim nagaramha nikkhamitva addasa bahiyam daruciriyam kalankatam;
ud1.10:11.3: “ganhatha, bhikkhave, bahiyassa daruciriyassa sarirakam; mancakam aropetva niharitva jhapetha; thupancassa karotha.
ud1.10:12.1: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva bahiyassa daruciriyassa sarirakam mancakam aropetva niharitva jhapetva thupancassa katva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
ud1.10:12.2: Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud1.10:12.3: “daddham, bhante, bahiyassa daruciriyassa sariram, thupo cassa kato.
ud1.10:12.5: “Pandito, bhikkhave, bahiyo daruciriyo paccapadi dhammassanudhammam; na ca mam dhammadhikaranam vihesesi.
ud1.10:13.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
ud1.10:16.1: Ayampi udano vutto bhagavata iti me sutanti.
